    • Method Detail

      • scaleCoordinates

        public static float[][] scaleCoordinates(double[][] points,
                         float scale)
        Returns a scaled version of the point cloud. Scales the coordinates by computing overall minimum and maximum and scaling uniformly in all directions such that all coordinates fit in a box of dimensions: [-scale, scale] x ... x [-scale, scale]
        Parameters:
        points -
        scale -
        Returns:
